sentences.en: A sinister inhuman scream rang out across the moors.
sentences.cn: 沼泽地里突然响起不像是人的不祥的尖叫声.

sentences.en: He now recollected the place and its sinister character.
sentences.cn: 现在,他想起了这个地方和它那阴险的特点了.

sentences.en: He was a handsome man, in a sinister sort of way.
sentences.cn: 他英俊的外貌中带着一点阴险。

sentences.en: In your remarks you allude to certain sinister development.
sentences.cn: 你在讲话中暗示某种不祥的事要发生.

sentences.en: In your remarks you alluded to a certain sinister design.
sentences.cn: 在你的谈话中,你提到了某个阴谋.

sentences.en: Maston was oppressed by sinister forebodings.
sentences.cn: 梅斯顿感到自己被一种不祥的预感紧紧地抓住了.

sentences.en: Naturally dark of skin, gloom made him look slightly sinister.
sentences.cn: 天生的黑皮肤, 忧郁使他看上去有点凶恶.

sentences.en: The glare has gone and no touch of the sinister remains.
sentences.cn: 光亮已经消逝,那凶险的迹象已荡然无存.

sentences.en: The more sinister explanation is that he is about to make mischief in the Middle East again.
sentences.cn: 更为险恶的解释是，他准备再次在中东地区制造事端。

sentences.en: The sinister atmosphere of the place left an indelible imprint on my memory.
sentences.cn: 此处不祥的氛围在我的记忆中刻下了不可磨灭的印记.

sentences.en: The two of them were silent , faces set in a sinister cast.
sentences.cn: 那两个人都板着脸一声不吭像是十分阴险.

sentences.en: Their proposals are all worthless and designed out of sinister motives.
sentences.cn: 他们的建议不仅一钱不值,而且包藏祸心.

sentences.en: There is a sinister side to these events.
sentences.cn: 这些事件有邪恶的一面。

sentences.en: There is something sinister at the back of that series of crimes.
sentences.cn: 在这一系列罪行背后有险恶的阴谋.

sentences.en: There was something cold and sinister about him.
sentences.cn: 他给人一种冷酷阴险的感觉。

sentences.en: There was something sinister about the power of that man.
sentences.cn: 这个人的本领可真有点令人发瘳.

sentences.en: There's a sinister - looking crack in the roof.
sentences.cn: 屋顶上有一条危险的裂缝.

trans.tran_cn: 危险的，不吉祥的，凶兆的，险恶的
trans.tran_en: making you feel that something evil, dangerous, or illegal is happening or will happen
